title: John Wick
description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max helps a rebellious woman and a group of female prisoners.

title: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and his team must stop a global catastrophe while being pursued by assassins.

title: Extraction
description: A black-market mercenary's mission to rescue a kidnapped boy goes awry in Bangladesh.

title: Nobody
description: An underestimated dad reveals his dark past after burglars target his home.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After 30 years, Maverick returns to train a new generation of elite pilots.

title: The Equalizer 2
description: Robert McCall seeks justice for the exploited and oppressed.

title: Tenet
description: A secret agent manipulates time to prevent World War III.

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond comes out of retirement to confront a new villain armed with dangerous technology.

title: The Batman
description: Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham linked to his own family.
